text.title: Ossian
text.more:
Interactive network of the epic Ossian poems.
The network shows interaction between characters.
Male characters are represented by blue nodes and females in green.
Red nodes have unspecified gender.
text.intro:
This network shows interactions between characters in the epic poems of Ossian.
The network is based on James Macpherson's text.
Blue nodes represents male characters and females are in green.
Red nodes have unspecified gender.
